$description: Log of design system divergences across products. Edit this file to record new divergences.

intentional.label: Intentional Divergence
intentional.description: Documented, accepted deviation from the system. Signals a potential system gap.

unintentional.label: Unintentional Drift
unintentional.description: Hardcoded values or patterns that bypassed the system, usually discovered in review.

technical-debt.label: Technical Debt
technical-debt.description: Known inconsistency that will be addressed later, tracked and prioritized.

blocked.label: Blocked by System
blocked.description: Team wanted to use system but couldn't due to missing feature or constraint.

statuses.accepted: Divergence reviewed and accepted as valid
statuses.resolved: Divergence addressed (either fixed or system updated)
statuses.wont-fix: Divergence acknowledged but won't be addressed

entries.description: Donor profile cards use a custom gradient background that doesn't map to semantic surface tokens. This is intentional to create visual distinction for a premium feature.
entries.alternativeUsed: Custom CSS gradient defined in donor-card.css
entries.rationale: Premium feature differentiation, approved by design leadership
